entry.title: WIND WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. High 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
